name: stats-card.toml

component.name: Stats Card
component.description: Displays a single metric with label, value and optional trend indicator

rawContent:
[component]
id = "stats-card"
name = "Stats Card"
description = "Displays a single metric with label, value and optional trend indicator"

[component.props]
label = "string"
value = "number | string"
icon = "LucideIcon (optional)"
trend = "{ value: number, direction: 'up' | 'down' } (optional)"
variant = "'default' | 'gradient' (default: 'default')"
color = "'cyan' | 'teal' | 'amber' | 'green' | 'purple' (default: 'cyan')"

[component.features]
list = [
  "Large value display",
  "Label text",
  "Optional icon",
  "Optional trend indicator with arrow",
  "Gradient variant for hero stats",
  "Color theming"
]

[component.styling]
gradient = "bg-gradient-to-br from-{color}-500 to-{color}-600 text-white"
default = "bg-white border"
responsive = true

[component.usage]
code = """
import { StatsCard } from '@prototype/components'

<StatsCard
  label="Total Orders"
  value={42}
  icon={ClipboardList}
  trend={{ value: 12, direction: 'up' }}
  variant="gradient"
  color="cyan"
/>
"""

[relations]
routes = ["admin-dashboard", "specialist-home"]

[implementation]
component = "StatsCard"
file = "src/prototype/components/StatsCard.tsx"
status = "planned"
